HydroRL
  • The hps package
  • View page source

The hps package

Note

The documentation of the hps package is meant to provide insight on what components are modelled in the hydro system.

The hps module

Top-level package for hps.

class hps.HydroSystem(name: str = '', nodes: Optional[Iterable[IHydroNode]] = None, edges: Optional[Iterable[IHydroEdge]] = None, **attr)

Class defining the hydro system.

add_edge(edge: IHydroEdge)

Add edge to the hydro system.

Note that the nodes in the edge has to be defined in the hydro system.

Parameters

edge (IHydroEdge) Edge to add in the hydro system

Raises

ValueError If a node is not defined in the hydro system

add_edges_from(edges: Iterable[IHydroEdge])

Add a iterable of edges to the hydro system.

Parameters

edges (Iterable[IHydroEdge]) Iterable of edges to add

add_node(node: IHydroNode)

Add node to the hydro system.

Parameters

node (IHydroNode) Node to add in the hydro system

Raises

ValueError If the node is not of type IHydroNode or it is already defined in the hydro system

add_nodes_from(nodes: Iterable[IHydroNode])

Add a iterable of nodes to the hydro system.

Parameters

nodes (Iterable[IHydroNode]) Iterable of nodes to add

property bypasses: List[Bypass]
Returns

Bypasses

Return type

List[Bypass]

property creeks: List[Creek]
Returns

Creeks

Return type

List[Creek]

property discharges: List[Discharge]
Returns

Discharges

Return type

List[Discharge]

property gates: List[Gate]
Returns

Gates

Return type

List[Gate]

get_subgraph(edge_type: ~typing.Type[~hps.system.edges.base_edge.IHydroEdge] = <class 'hps.system.edges.discharge.Discharge'>) → HydroSystem

Get a subgraph containing only edges with a given type.

Parameters

edge_type (Type[IHydroEdge], optional) The required edge type, defaults to Discharge

Returns

A subgraph of the hydro system

Return type

HydroSystem

property my_edges: List
Returns

Edges

Return type

List

property my_nodes: List
Returns

Nodes

Return type

List

property oceans: List[Ocean]
Returns

Oceans

Return type

List[Ocean]

property power_stations: List[PowerStation]
Returns

Power stations

Return type

List[PowerStation]

property reservoirs: List[Reservoir]
Returns

Reservoirs

Return type

List[Reservoir]

property spillages: List[Spillage]
Returns

Spillages

Return type

List[Spillage]

to_dict()

Method used to serialize the hydro system.

Returns

Serialized hydro system

Return type

dict
